fr.clementgarbay.planner.planning

Class CommonTimeSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.clementgarbay.planner.planning.TimeSlot
      • fr.clementgarbay.planner.planning.CommonTimeSlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class CommonTimeSlot
extends TimeSlot
implements java.lang.Comparable
    Represents a common time slot between multiple persons with a impossibility factor. More this factor is higher, the less people are available at the same time (or have already an event with a high priority level). So, if the status is equal to 0, then all of people are available.
